original_title: The Poetry Revival Presents: Year of the Elephant Engine - The Film
overview: A spoken word concert experience featuring Buddy Wakefield, Derrick Brown, Anis Mojgani. Also special guests Mike McGee, Andrea Gibson, Shira Erlichman, and Robbie Q. Telfer.
tagline: "Nothing captures the spirit of the traveling American poet better than this film." - LB Post
title: Year of the Elephant Engine (2010)
